title: Problem with Macro

replies.body:
http://fcdn.mtbr.com/attachments/downhill-freeride/704128d1359601749t-new-school-gravity-bikes-thread-necromancy-thread-necromancy-demotivational-poster-1271554886.jpg

you must type

| #WinActiveLeagueOfLegends | at the top
Yeah I've also done text based ones. That just say GG and stuff like that. But even they don't work.

Ive only made a few text based macro's to spam certain things in game, like "its bait, dont fall for it"...etc

I found putting in a 0.25 ms delay between keystrokes got it to work. This is for a logitech keyboard & the "G-Keys". it might work with Auto-it but I'm not sure.

Also, its probably worth noting from what I understand making a macro for anything other than a text commands that do more than 1 key press might get you banned. Although nothing you appear to be doing e.g making you laugh on movement would "give you an unfiar advantage" I'd still be careful as it might get picked up as a script.
If you do that, enjoy not being able to lasthit or orbwalk, oh and the fact your entire team will mute you.
